alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 2:14PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A few strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Norfolk, northwestern Plymouth and north central Bristol Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 213 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a few strong thunderstorms over Whitman, or near Brockton, moving east northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Brockton, Taunton, Weymouth, Braintree, Randolph, Stoughton, Bridgewater, Marshfield, Mansfield, Easton, Hingham, Norton, Scituate, Pembroke, Sharon, Rockland, Abington, Duxbury, Whitman, and Hanover. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle. This storm may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth
